channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 16
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 16

item.title: CVE-2024-49388|2024-10-15T10:34:24.960Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2016
item.description: Sensitive information manipulation due to improper authorization. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 16 (Linux, Windows) before build 38690.

item.title: CVE-2024-49383|2024-10-15T10:33:14.227Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2016
item.description: Excessive attack surface in acep-importer service due to binding to an unrestricted IP address. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 16 (Linux, Windows) before build 38690.

item.title: CVE-2024-49387|2024-10-15T10:34:10.675Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2016
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information in acep-collector service. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 16 (Linux, Windows) before build 38690.

item.title: CVE-2024-49382|2024-10-15T10:32:55.845Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2016
item.description: Excessive attack surface in archive-server service due to binding to an unrestricted IP address. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 16 (Linux, Windows) before build 38690.

item.title: CVE-2024-49384|2024-10-15T10:33:52.655Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2016
item.description: Excessive attack surface in acep-collector service due to binding to an unrestricted IP address. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 16 (Linux, Windows) before build 38690.
